name: Two Difference
desc:
Given an array and find two numbers in the array having difference equal to given number.

Your solution should return indices of the two numbers. If there are multiple pairs, just return any of them.

You may assume that the input array has no duplicates.
judge_type_cpp: out[i].size() != answer.size() || (out[i][0]!=-1 && answer[0]!=-1 && abs(in_0[i][answer[0]] - in_0[i][answer[1]]) != in_1[i])
judge_type_python: len(out[i]) != len(answer) or (out[i][0]!=-1 and answer[0]!=-1 and abs(in_0[i][answer[0]] - in_0[i][answer[1]]) != in_1[i])
